context.p: A project within the Capacity Planner is intended to be a representation of a project within the associated cloud pod. It references the deployment type that the user wishes to use this project for, as well as the team that will be using it.
Create a new project for the Capacity Planner

prereq.p: To create a new project the user must have the following:

ul.li: Associated Pod already created in the tool
Associated Team already created in the tool
Associated Deployment Type already created in the tool

info.p: Click the project view from the nav bar at the top.
Click the Create new project button
Enter the details in the fields.
NOTE: Restrictions on the fields are as follows:

ul.li: NameName must be unique within the selected Pod
Pod must be an existing pod that the user has created
Team must be an existing team that the user has already created
Deployment Type must be an existing deployment type that that user has already created
CPU, Memory and Cinder Storage must all be positive integers

info.p: Click the Save button and you will be redirected back to the previous page where you can see the newly created project as well as the pod it resides in with new options to edit and delete that project.
NOTE: Project will not save if any fields are invalid (RED in UI)

result.p: A New Project is created in the Capacity Planner.
